lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Randy Edsall’s new contract includes a buyout clause that would have him pay back up to $1.5 million if he takes a job with another university or an N.F.L. team. The university released details of the five-year deal that Edsall signed Feb. 14 after a season in which the Huskies won a share of the Big East title.
